definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: The heavy haze has covered many buildings in our country, including the Petronas Twin Tower.
sentences.chinese: 煙霾的已經蓋過了我國的許多高樓大廈，包括雙峯塔。

sentences.english: The sky's all blue in a light blue haze.
sentences.chinese: 淡藍色的煙霾中，天空蔚藍一片。
